trigger.title: Trigger: Channeling Lightning
trigger.description: Triggers after the player successfully uses the Channeling enchantment on an entity or a lightning rod.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

victims.title: Victims
victims.description: The victims hit by the lightning summoned by the Channeling enchantment. All entities in this list must be hit.

anyOf.description: Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The checks are applied to the victim hit by the lighting, with the origin being the position of the player that would get the advancement.
